title: Section Selector UIU
description: In university, I found it really irritating to select class timings before each trimester started as I had to look through all the section times of the courses that I want to take and figure out a routine that suits my need manually. So, I tried to make it a bit more fun by creating this helper app.
features: UIU students can enter their sections and it's repective time.
The app will generate all possible routines.
